mapper.insert: insert into memberreport values (#{sale_seq}, #{sale_id}, seq_memberreport.nextval, #{report_id}, #{report_name}, #{reportType}, #{report_tal}, #{report_subject}, #{report_content}, #{report_image1}, #{report_image2}, #{report_image3}, #{report_state}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(*) from memberreport where report_id=#{report_id}
mapper.update: update memberreport set sale_seq=#{sale_seq}, sale_id=#{sale_id}, reportType=#{reportType}, report_tal=#{report_tal}, report_subject=#{report_subject}, report_content=#{report_content}, report_image1=#{report_image1}, report_image2=#{report_image2}, report_image3=#{report_image3}, logtime=sysdate where report_seq=#{report_seq}
update reportcomment set comment_content=#{comment_content}, logtime=sysdate where comment_seq=#{comment_seq}
